---
id: list-secrets
title: "ListSecrets"
description: "Retrieves a paginated list of all secrets in the workspace with optional filtering and sorting. All secret values are masked."

---

</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/secrets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of all secrets in the workspace with optional filtering and sorting. All secret values are masked.
